summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Precious LUXURY CAVIAR GEL CREAM-sheer and weightless,rich with precious caviar extract,full of vitamins and minerals.Smooth skin.Light texture,quickly absorbed. 1.7fl.oz(50Ml) Review Date: 2016/10/05 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 2.24 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: I really want to give this product 5 stars, but the heavy perfumey smell is what downgrades it to a 4 star review.

Other than that, this product is GREAT for the face. It is chock full of great ingredients of the skin, and looks like a super high end spa face cream. I love that it has caviar extract in it, which makes it not run-of-the-mill. It absorbs so quicky into the skin and leaves my face feeling soft and supple for days afterward.

If only it didn't have such a strong perfume smell, then I'd wear it more often. If you are sensitive or allergic to perfumed creams, then I would skip this. The smell lingers heavily all day. Review Title: Nice facial cream, but heavy on the perfumes. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JUNG SAEM MOOL OFFICIAL] JUNGSAEMMOOL Minifying Cica Mist Balm Review Date: 2022/08/11 Store: JUNG SAEM MOOL Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JUNG SAEM MOOL', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Country/Region Of Origin': 'Republic of Korea', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 3.07 x 1.14 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a Korean face balm, that is supposed to sooth sensitive skin and cover up redness on the skin. The instructions and all the ads on Amazon are in Korean, and I HIGHLY recommend that the sellers switch this to include English instructions. I had to go to their website in order to find out the ingredients and what it was supposed to do for the skin, and most people aren't going to do that.
To continue, the balm contains 2 plant ingredientspine sprouts and centella asiatica roots. The cica pine water helps sooth and moisturize sensitive skin. The color in the balm comes from calamine powder, which helps cover red areas of the skin. It is a 100% vegan formula. The balm comes in a compact with a puff applicator. The puff is eco-friendly and anti-bacterial. This is meant to be applied as the last step during the skincare routine and before you apply your makeup.

Overall, I found this product easy to apply. You dip the poof into the cream balm, and then apply it to the skin. It has an almost creamy texture on the skin, and absorbs in quickly. It has a slight white cast when I used it but that went away as it absorbed in. I was hoping to use this as a color corrective on red areas on my skin before I applied concealer (I currently do not use foundation). Overall I think it is nice, but it really hasn't gotten rid of any redness on my skin. I do like the way it feels though and I think it helps my makeup go on smoother, so I plan to keep using it. Review Title: Calming face balm Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: essence | Welcome to Miami Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Blendable Shades | Matte & Metallic | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Made Without Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles Review Date: 2022/08/26 Store: essence cosmetics Product Description: ["¡BIENVENIDOS A MIAMI! With the essence welcome to MIAMI eyeshadow palette, we're bringing the sunny vibes of Florida into our make-up bags. The bright and bold color palette is inspired by the iconic Miami beaches and art deco landmarks. The 12 highly-pigmented are sure to create a feeling of happiness with their nude, pink, violet, turquoise and green shades. Thanks to the diverse finishes ranging from matte to metallic, you can create countless looks for any occasion. This product is vegan & cruelty free and is formulated without oil, fragrance, parabens, alcohol, & microplastic particles."] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free, Oil Free, Alcohol Free, Microplastic Particle Free, Paraben Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 3.25 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934930', 'Manufacturer': 'essence cosmetics', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: This is a nice palette of 12 various shades. It comes in a flip case with a mirror. They are very pigmented, and were fun to play with. I went all out on the shimmery dark pink and gold, as I've always wanted to try bright shimmery shadow. The colors are very buildable and there was minimal fallout. I loved how bright these are and how well they show up on my skin tone. Great for a wow look! Review Title: Fun bright colors! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eye Corrector Serum With Triple Peptides 1 oz. (28g) by BeautyLux Review Date: 2022/08/29 Store: BeautyLux Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'BeautyLux', 'Item Weight': '28 Grams', 'Package Dimensions': '4.83 x 2.28 x 2.28 inches; 0.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '850030106148'} Review Text: This eye serum is supposed to diminish dark circles and the appearance of fine lines through the use of peptides, citric acid and bergamot oil. I found that this serum went on smoothly, and you only need one or two drops to cover both eye areas. It absorbed in nicely. My eye area looked hydrated and more refreshed after use.

I do agree with the other reviewer who mentioned that they expected a box for the pump bottle, not it arriving just in the bottle and shrink wrapped. The shrink wrapping felt a little cheap and it was also frustrating to get off the bottle. Review Title: Nice peptide eye serum Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hook Ya Sport Non-Nano Mineral Sunscreen 3oz, 2 Pack 6oz Total, Reef Safe, UVA/UVB Protection, Octinoxate & Oxybenzone Free, Bait Safe, Boat Safe, Non-Greasy, No Fragrance, Ultralight Finish, Approved for use in Hawaii and Mexico, Made in the USA Review Date: 2022/09/08 Store: Hook'Ya Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 3 x 3 inches; 3 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': "Hook'Ya", 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: Nice reef safe mineral sunscreen in a squeeze bottle. I used this for a day on the lake, and was well protected from the sun. The sunscreen has a very faint smell, is creamy and absorbs easily into the skin without any of the dreaded super white cast. I didn't have any irritation from this sunscreen. Overall I really liked it, and I'm happy it comes in a 2 pack. Review Title: Hook Ya suncreen works well! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: REBONCEL Aqua Rich Hydrating Face Foam Cleanser Gentle Hypoallergenic pH Balance Korean Skin Care Face Wash Cleansing Foam(8.45 fl.oz 250ml) Review Date: 2022/12/01 Store: Reboncel Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Brand': 'Reboncel', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 3.27 x 2.32 inches; 11.71 Ounces'} Review Text: Giant bottle of Foam cleanser. Light scent. I had no irritation when using this product. It cleaned my face and left it feeling soft and hydrated afterwards. Review Title: Great cleanser Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has expressed satisfaction with several skincare and makeup products, highlighting aspects such as effective hydration, luxurious textures, and enjoyable application experiences. Positive feedback includes the quick absorption of creams, soothing properties of balms, and high pigmentation of eyeshadows. The lightweight nature and skin-soothing benefits of products created a feeling of softness and comfort. Additionally, the user appreciated products that were eco-friendly, vegan, and free from harmful ingredients. Overall, the aesthetic appeal and enjoyable results fostered a positive shopping experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Despite the mostly favorable reviews, the user noted several issues that detracted from their experiences. A heavy perfume scent in one face cream was particularly off-putting, leading to a reduced rating. Instructions for one product were only available in a foreign language, causing confusion. Additionally, expectations for packaging were unmet for a serum, which arrived in a basic and less appealing form. Some products did not deliver the expected corrective results for skin redness, leading to some disappointment. 

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's shopping experience reflects a mix of satisfaction and frustration. While many products delivered positive results in terms of hydration, texture, and effectiveness, there were notable grievances regarding scents, language barriers in instructions, and insufficient packaging. Despite these issues, the enjoyable aspects of the products, particularly in skincare and makeup application, suggest that the overall experience remains predominantly positive, with room for improvement in certain areas.

target_interaction.title: Heavy scent
target_interaction.text: Very smoothing and hydrating face moisturizer, but it has a heavy scent/perfume that lingers quite substantially.  It is also a bit heavy for my face, but would be perfect for my decollage.  The scent is too much for me, not a fan. Wish they had a scent free version, especially since the jar is so pretty and this would make a lovely gift.
target_interaction.title_meta: Mica Beauty Facial Moisturizer Day and Night Cream, Neck and Chest Cream to smooth skin and reduce wrinkles, Suitable for all skin, including mature, delicate and sensitive skin1 oz
